input.sentences: i awoke to a snow covered world .
the ducks did n't understand where the water had gone .
i just sheared the sheep last week . i should have waited .
i left the tractor out overnight . now its almost unrecognizable .
i have plenty of fuel for the generators . we will stay warm through the cold .
output.sentences: I cannot believe how much it snowed!
The ducks seem to be enjoying it.
The sheep, however, they are huddling to stay warm with all the snow.
The sheep blended well with their white wool, my tractor is very out of place.
I cannot wait until summer when the snow will be gone.
